channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Aria Operations for Networks (Formerly vRealize Network Insight)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Aria Operations for Networks (Formerly vRealize Network Insight)

item.title: CVE-2023-20887|2023-06-07T14:16:56.641Z -- n%2Fa -- aria%20operations%20for%20networks%20%28formerly%20vrealize%20network%20insight%29
item.description: Aria Operations for Networks contains a command injection vulnerability. A malicious actor with network access to VMware Aria Operations for Networks may be able to perform a command injection attack resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-20889|2023-06-07T14:20:14.452Z -- n%2Fa -- aria%20operations%20for%20networks%20%28formerly%20vrealize%20network%20insight%29
item.description: Aria Operations for Networks contains an information disclosure vulnerability. A malicious actor with network access to VMware Aria Operations for Networks may be able to perform a command injection attack resulting in information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2023-20888|2023-06-07T14:18:41.771Z -- n%2Fa -- aria%20operations%20for%20networks%20%28formerly%20vrealize%20network%20insight%29
item.description: Aria Operations for Networks contains an authenticated deserialization vulnerability. A malicious actor with network access to VMware Aria Operations for Networks and valid 'member' role credentials may be able to perform a deserialization attack resulting in remote code execution.
